documents.t: Production Ready Production Server Setup Guide Production-grade setup and security skeleton for Ubuntu, CentOS, RHEL, and Rocky/Alma. Quick StartOpen Quizzes Quick Links Ubuntu InstallMinimal + network + baselineCentOS InstallStream + profile + servicesRHEL InstallSubscription + KickstartRocky/Alma InstallRHEL-compatible distro
Production-grade setup and security skeleton for Ubuntu, CentOS, RHEL, and Rocky/Alma. Quick StartOpen Quizzes
Covers key decisions, assumptions, and minimum security expectations.

Target audience and use cases Scope: Ubuntu, CentOS, RHEL, Rocky/Alma Security, operations, and production readiness Security Note Defaults are not secure. Harden SSH, firewall, and access policies before production. Operations Note No maintenance windows, rollback plan, or monitoring means no production readiness.

Answer after reading the docs. Explain the answer briefly.

Default firewall service on CentOS? A) ufw B) firewalld C) nftables D) pf Details Answer firewalld SELinux modes are? A) Enforcing/Permissive/Disabled B) Open/Closed C) Kernel/User D) A/B Details Answer Enforcing/Permissive/Disabled Package manager is? A) apt B) dnf/yum C) pacman D) zypper Details Answer dnf/yum
Answer after reading the docs. Explain the answer briefly.

How should quizzes be used? A) Answer instantly B) Read docs first, then try C) Check answers then read D) Pick randomly Details Answer Read docs first, then try Why do quizzes exist? A) Memorization B) Checklists C) Learning and reinforcement D) Just time Details Answer Learning and reinforcement
Answer after reading the docs. Explain the answer briefly.

How is official repo access managed in RHEL? A) Subscription Manager B) APT C) Snap D) Flatpak Details Answer Subscription Manager Preferred approach for kernel updates? A) Random reboot B) Planned maintenance window C) No updates D) GUI only Details Answer Planned maintenance window Key hardening policy for RHEL? A) SELinux policy B) AppArmor profile C) pfctl D) launchd Details Answer SELinux policy
Answer after reading the docs. Explain the answer briefly.

Rocky/Alma is closest to which family? A) Debian B) RHEL C) Arch D) SUSE Details Answer RHEL Default firewall service? A) ufw B) firewalld C) pf D) iptables Details Answer firewalld Recommended for secure SSH? A) Root login B) Key-based access C) Share password D) Telnet Details Answer Key-based access
Answer after reading the docs. Explain the answer briefly.

Which simple firewall tool is common on Ubuntu? A) firewalld B) ufw C) iptables D) pf Details Answer ufw Where do you change the SSH port? A) /etc/ssh/sshd_config B) /etc/passwd C) /etc/hosts D) /etc/fstab Details Answer /etc/ssh/sshd_config Where are Netplan configs stored? A) /etc/netplan/ B) /etc/network/ C) /etc/sysconfig/ D) /etc/ifcfg/ Details Answer /etc/netplan/ Preferred secure access method for production? A) Root password B) Key-based SSH C) Open ports D) Telnet Details Answer Key-based SSH
